configuration.application_title: COVID-19 Medical Resource Demand Dashboard - Virginia

scenarios.description: This model assumes that Virginia's social-distancing order is lifted on May 8th, that public social interactivity returns to 33% of pre-pandemic levels, and that typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 8 days. Updated 2020-05-05.

This model assumes that Virginia's social-distancing order is lifted on May 8th, that public social interactivity returns to 33% of pre-pandemic levels, and that typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 14 days. Updated 2020-05-05.

This model assumes that Virginia's social-distancing order is lifted on May 8th, that public social interactivity returns to 66% of pre-pandemic levels, and that typical COVID-19 hospitalizations last about 8 days. Updated 2020-05-05.
